1.name: Foothills
1.description: You find yourself standing at the base of an enormous mountain.  At its base to the north, there is a massive doorway.  A sign nearby reads "Keep out!  Definitely no treasure within!"

2.name: Foothills
2.description: As you begin to leave, you feel the urge for adventure pulling you back...

3.name: Dark cave
3.description: This seems to be the mouth of a deep cave.  As you peer north into the darkness, you think you hear the echoes of bats deeper within.

4.name: Dark cave
4.description: The cave is somewhat narrow here, and the light from the doorway to the south is quite dim.

5.name: Dark cave
5.description: The cave acoustics dramatically change as you find yourself at a legde above a large chasm.  There is barely enough light here to notice a rope bridge leading out into the dark emptiness.

6.name: Rope bridge
6.description: This rope bridge creaks as you walk along it.  You aren't sure how old it is, or whether it can even support your weight.

7.name: Falling through the air!
7.description: As you continue along the bridge, it snaps!  You try to grab the bridge, but it evades your grasp in the darkness.  You are plummeting quickly downward into the chasm...

8.name: Moss cavern
8.description: You are standing in a large cavern full of bioluminescent moss.  It must have broken your fall!  The cavern extends to the east and west; at the west end, you think you see a passage leading out of the cavern.

9.name: Moss cavern
9.description: You are standing in a large cavern full of bioluminescent moss.  The cavern extends to the west.

10.name: Moss cavern
10.description: You are standing in a large cavern full of bioluminescent moss.  The cavern extends to the east.  There is a crevise in the rocks which opens into a passage.

11.name: Passage
11.description: You are in a crevise on the west wall of the moss cavern.  A dark passage leads further west.  There is a ladder here which leads down into a smaller, moss-filled cavern below.

12.name: Twisty passages
12.description: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all dimly lit by more bioluminescent moss.  There is a ladder here leading up.

13.name: Twisty passages
13.description: You are in a maze of little twisty passages, all alike.

14.name: Twisty passages
14.description: You are in a twisty maze of little passages, all alike.

15.name: Passage
15.description: It is pitch black.  You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

16.name: Fumbling around in the darkness
16.description: Without a source of light, you have become hopelessly lost and are fumbling around in the darkness.

17.name: Fumbling around in the darkness
17.description: You can't seem to find your way.  However, you do think you hear low growling in the distance.

18.name: Panicked and lost
18.description: The growling is getting louder.  Did I mention there are Grues down here?

19.name: Twisty passages
19.description: You are in a maze of alike little passages, all twisty.

20.name: Twisty passages
20.description: You are in a maze of alike twisty passages, all little.

21.name: Twisty passages
21.description: You are in a little maze of twisty passages, all alike.

22.name: Twisty passages
22.description: You are in a twisty alike of little passages, all maze.

23.name: Twisty passages
23.description: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

24.name: Passage
24.description: You feel that your light source is more than sufficient to keep grues away.

25.name: Dark passage
25.description: You are in a narrow passage.  There is darkness to the west, but you can barely see a glowing opening to the east.

26.name: Dark passage
26.description: You are in a dark, narrow passage.

27.name: Dark passage
27.description: You are in a dark, narrow passage.  To the west, you spot some vegetation where the passage expands.

28.name: Ruins
28.description: You stand in a large cavern with a huge ruin to the north, overgrown by plant life.  There is a large stone archway to the north acting as the doorway to the ruined complex.  A crevice in the rock to the east leads to an alarmingly dark passageway.

29.name: Ruins
29.description: You are in the once-opulent foyer of a massive ruined complex.  There is a door to the south leading to the overgrowth outside and stairs to the north which lead into a larger hall.

30.name: Ruins
30.description: You stand in the massive central hall of these ruins.  The walls are crumbling, and vegetation has clearly taken over.  Rooms are attached in all directions.  There is a strange monument in the center of the hall with circular slots and unusual symbols.  It reads:

31.name: Ruins
31.description: You stand in what seems to have once been a dining hall; broken tables and pottery are scattered everywhere.  A staircase here leads down.

32.name: Ruins
32.description: This seems to be a kitchen; there are brick stoves and shelves along the wall.  Everything here has fallen into disrepair.

33.name: Ruins
33.description: You find yourself in what was once the living quarters for the complex.  Many smaller rooms which once had walls to divide them now lay in disarray.  There is a staircase up here.

34.name: Ruins
34.description: This was long ago a lavish throne room.  Dried-up fountains and crumbling statues line the walls, and the carved stone throne in the center of the room is falling apart.

35.name: Ruins
35.description: Because it has been so well-protected, this room hardly shows signs of decay.  The walls are covered in elaborate murals and decorated with precious metals and stones.

36.name: Synacor Headquarters
36.description: You stand in the lobby of what appears to be a really fun place to work!  Sadly, there doesn't seem to be anyone around at the moment, so you make a note to call them later.  The bookshelf here looks like it might have something interesting in it, though.

37.name: Synacor Headquarters
37.description: It's a warm, sunny day!  While the breeze from Lake Erie is certainly refreshing, you don't see anything here that will help you with your quest.
